A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I grew up on the original Star Wars films and I am a huge fan of them. To say I was disappointed in this film is an understatement. I thought the characters were cheesy and shallow\, the costumes were rubbish and the story was at times boring. I did not enjoy it at all. I'm going to pretend I haven't seen it and the only Star Wars films that exist are the original ones.
